moves.1. e4: Hey, welcome to the chess lesson.
moves.1... e5 2. Nf3 f6 3. Nxe5 fxe5: Now I decide my queen chess move to QD1-h5 to check it.  I have 3 move still check.  The black got king stuck.
Now I move a white pawn.
moves.7... d6 8. h5+: I next pawn to check the king.  The black forgot to move away the king. :O
moves.8... Kh6 9. d3+: the pawn move to de-d3 because of Bb1 to check it.
moves.9... g5 10. hxg6 e.p.+ Kxg6 11. Qh5+ Kg7: If you have any question and hope you understand. :D  Enjoy!
